name: Cowboy Detective
description:
Its the one and only Cowboy Detective!

This is a short game made for the 

I Can't Draw But Want To Make A Game (Again)

You play as the cowboy detective. solving a short murder case, but dont let that fool you, this is not a serious game. So have fun with it

Cowboy detective voiced by:Chris  ChrisGreenfieldVO@gmail.com

This is my first game I've finished, so I am up for constructive criticism!
